CameraInput::BaseCameraInput

CameraInput::BaseCameraInput Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for CameraInput::BaseCameraInput:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Base class for all the camera input (capture) devices.

bool CameraInput::BaseCameraInput::init ( int  width = 320,
int  height = 240,
int  fps = 25,
bool  color = true 
) [virtual]

Initializes the class so it becomes valid.

For internal use only.

Parameters:
[in] width width resolution capture
[in] height height resolution capture
[in] fps frames per second to capture
[in] color if true captured images will be color (if supported by the camera), false means b/w
Returns:
true if the initialization was ok | false otherwise

Reimplemented in CameraInput::PVCamera.

For internal use only.

void CameraInput::BaseCameraInput::setNewFrameData ( unsigned char *  data,
unsigned int  size 
) [protected]

For internal use only.

the data of the camera frame. This method should be called by subclasses to update the captured images

Parameters:
[in] data Image data to update (the just captured camera frame)
[in] size Size in bytes of the image data
